description: Jake is a hot Marine I met recently while cruising through the parking lot of a local strip club. I had actually missed him while I was inside because he was in the back getting a couch dance. He says he's innocent and that he was simply doing research.Jake is 20 years old, 6' 3' and weighs in at 195 lbs. He likes playing baseball, running and riding motorcycles. He played baseball all through high school. He held positions on second base and short stop. Jake's been in the Marine Corps for about a year and a half. He's packing a 8'x6' cock to match that tall, lean body. And he says he started watching porn and jerking off when he was eight-years old.I personally couldn't get enough of this hot stud. That dick is beautiful and his smile is so cute. I started wondering immediately if he'd consider moving from second base on to third. My mind was racing but I was careful not to overload him with too much information at first.Just when I met Jake I was about to head back to the East Coast for another trip, so things would have to wait a bit.While I was away he and I kept in close contact via text messages and I kept talking to him about other possibilities. Jake had brought a buddy over with him the night we met and he stressed how important it was that his buddy not find out about anything other than the jack off video. I assured him that wouldn't happen and by the time I returned from the East Coast he was ready to take things to another level.
title: Jake, Scene #01
